SELECT artist_name, COUNT(album_id) AS num_albums FROM artists LEFT JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_id IN (SELECT artist_id FROM albums WHERE album_name LIKE '%Best%');

SELECT artist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS num_songs FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_songs > 5 ORDER BY num_songs DESC;
